thread.title: Post Properties Set to Join the S&P MidCap 400; U.S. Physical Therapy to Join S&P SmallCap 600
thread.title_full: Post Properties Set to Join the S&P MidCap 400; U.S. Physical Therapy to Join S&P SmallCap 600

title: Post Properties Set to Join the S&P MidCap 400; U.S. Physical Therapy to Join S&P SmallCap 600
text:
Post Properties Set to Join the S&P MidCap 400; U.S. Physical Therapy to Join S&P SmallCap 600 S&P Dow Jones Indices 1 hour ago  Content preferences Done 
NEW YORK, Oct. 21, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- S&P SmallCap 600 constituent Post Properties Inc. ( PPS ) will replace HCC Insurance Holdings Inc. ( HCC ) in the S&P MidCap 400, and U.S. Physical Therapy Inc. ( USPH ) will replace Post Properties in the S&P SmallCap 600 after the close of trading on Tuesday, October 27. Tokio Marine Holdings is acquiring HCC Insurance Holdings in a cash deal expected to be completed on or about that date, pending final conditions. 
Post Properties, a real estate investment trust (REIT), develops, owns, and manages multi-family apartment communities. Headquartered in Atlanta, GA, the company will be added to the S&P MidCap 400 GICS (Global Industry Classification Standard) Residential REITs Sub-Industry index. 
U.S. Physical Therapy operates outpatient physical therapy clinics. Headquartered in Houston, TX, the company will be added to the S&P SmallCap 600 GICS Health Care Facilities Sub-Industry index. 
Following is a summary of the changes: S&P MIDCAP 400 INDEX – October 27, 2015 COMPANY S&P SMALLCAP 600 INDEX – October 27, 2015 COMPANY Financials Residential REITs 
Additions to and deletions from S&P Dow Jones Indices do not in any way reflect an opinion on the investment merits of the companies involved. 
For more information about S&P Dow Jones Indices, please visit www.spdji.com About S&P Dow Jones Indices

More assets are invested in products based upon our indices than any other provider in the world. With over 1,000,000 indices covering a wide range of asset classes across the globe, S&P Dow Jones Indices LLC defines the way investors measure and trade the markets.
